thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Spanish stocks - Factors to watch on Wednesday

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Spanish stocks - Factors to watch on Wednesday
text:
The following Spanish stocks may be affected by newspaper reports and other factors on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified the newspaper reports, and cannot vouch for their accuracy:
DURO FELGUERA Spain’s market regulator suspended trading in Duro Felguera before the market opened and without giving a reason.
PRISA Spanish online newspaper El Confidencial said Prisa, owner of Spanish newspaper ‘El Pais’, is considering selling its stake in French newspaper ‘Le Monde’.
IBERDROLA Spanish newspaper Expansion said on Wednesday Australia’s Macquarie is considering the purchase of a stake in the subsidiary of Germany’s RWE, Innogy, after speculation that Italy’s Enel and Iberdrola may be interested.
